heading: About Me
description: Hi there! I’m John Lilly, a self-taught developer with a background in communications who found a sustainable way to support my growing family through web development.
Relationships mean everything to me — from my wife and kids to my extended family, my brothers in Youth Apostles, and my coworkers at Apple FCU.
With experience in CMS development, front-end design, SEO, and accessibility, I’m ready to take on any project that helps people connect and create something meaningful online.
